dcterms:creator: F. Maxwell Harper
Joseph A. Konstan
dcterms:description: MovieLens 100K is a widely used dataset in recommendation systems, containing users' ratings towards movies along with attributes such as gender, age, and occupation. This version includes 100,000 ratings.
dcterms:title: MovieLens 100K (ML-100K)

dcterms:creator: Ruining He
Julian McAuley
dcterms:description: MovieLens 1M is an extension of the MovieLens dataset containing 1 million ratings. It includes user attributes such as gender, age, and occupation.
dcterms:title: MovieLens 1M (ML-1M)

dcterms:creator: Alessandro B Melchiorre
Navid Rekabsaz
Emilia Parada-Cabaleiro
Stefan Brandl
Oleg Lesota
Markus Schedl
dcterms:description: LFM-2B is a dataset that contains over 2 billion listening events used for music retrieval and recommendation tasks. It includes user attributes such as gender, age, and country.
dcterms:title: LFM-2B
